TimelineReader.ProcHeader

public TimelineReader.ProcHeader(java.lang.String procStr)
Constructor which makes the procHeader from a String. Fundamental guarantee: after creation, the ProcHeader object has a non-null (but possibly empty) string content.

Parameters:
procStr - a non-null string representing the contents of the ProcHeader.
Throws:
